name: Hudson Navarro
review: The best car I ever owned. It will put smile on your face each time you drive it. Is it practical of course not but who cares.

name: Buchanan Nelson
review: This car is a very nice luxury sports car, with great kick to it as it has an oem twin scroll turbo, and with it being manual the feel of the drive is much more fun!.

name: Bettie Buckley
review: This car sounds incredible and drives even better. I love driving top-down and could drive it to California and back. Just an incredible vehicle.

name: Fannie Odonnell
review: Slightly larger then the 328i sedan but just as Sporty, Smooth drive, Reliable and with Great Utility. Great car for someone who likes speed and driving the kids around. I love this car!!

name: Devi John
review: This car has met all of my needs, it is streamline, edgy and a joy to drive. It handles well and makes driving a breeze!

name: Hasly winston
review: Clean interior. Never smoking or eating in the car. I bought it from BMW Santa Barbara and only 8K miles on it at that time. Never used for off-road or towing

name: Kimberly Massey
review: The car has far exceeded my expectations. The comfort level is excellent and the exterior looks great. This one is the luxury collection and it shows.
